de.systemagmbh.common.util
Class CSysConv

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.common.util.CSysConv
public class CSysConv
extends Object

This class contains some methods that convert the given object into an instance of another class.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Eugen Obermeier
